content: उच्च {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} High(in all senses); tall; क्षितिधारणोच्चं <ls>Ku. 7. 68</ls>; elevated, superior, exalted (family &c.). {@--2@} Loud, high-sounding; उच्चाः पक्षिगणाः <ls>Śi. 4. 18.</ls> {@--3@} Intense, violent, strong. {@--4@} (In <ab>astr.</ab>) Ascendant; see उच्चसंश्रय below. --च्चः The apex of the orbit of a planet.
